title: Sky Doll: La Ville Blanche
description: As power-hungry Papess Ludovique seeks more control over the citizens of Papathéa, those who still honor the memory of the outcast ruler Agape rise up in protest. Noa the Sky Doll finds herself in the middle of a Holy War, and quickly becomes swept up in it as rumors of her true powers spread across the planet. Roy and Jahu do their best to protect her, but as Noa soon discovers, one cannot escape one's destiny.
author: Alessandro Barbucci
